thread.title: Free Fishing Days 2017: Fish Without a License
thread.title_full: Free Fishing Days 2017: Fish Without a License

author: mpricehip2save
title: Free Fishing Days 2017: Fish Without a License
text:
Spend time together in the great outdoors! Free Fishing Days are the perfect time to take the kids fishing or try it out for yourself as you can fish on public property without a fishing license. Head here to see which days are free in your state.
Note that some locations will even have free trailers set up during these special free fishing days, with fishing rods and tackle you can use free of charge – check your state’s fish & game website as well for more details.
And be careful not to get a fish hook in the head ! (Thanks, Freebies for a Cause !)
